short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create PR review message with template

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a developer, you may need to notify your team to review your pull request in different instant messaging, such as Slack, Microsoft Teams, etc.
Bitbucket PR review provide a easy way to copy PR link and related Jira Card link with customize template.

Basic usage:
1. Go to the bitbucket pull request page that you want to get review
2. click "ðŸ“‹ Copy review message" to copy message
3. message can be paste to slack

How to customize text template:
1. click the extension icon on toolbar to show the popup
2. update the template in the popup

Special template key:
1. {PR_LINK}
You can place {PR_LINK} in the template to represent the pull request link. It will capture the url in current window as the pull request link.

2. {JIRA_CARD}
You can place {JIRA_CARD} in the template to represent the Jira card link. It will use the Jira card number and link on the pull request header as the linked text and link.

3. {PR_HEADER}
You can place {PR_HEADER} in the template to represent the pull request header content. It will use the pull request header content and remove the Jira card link content.

4. {JIRA_HEADER}
You can place {JIRA_HEADER} in the template to represent the related Jira card title content.
